title: Agricultural Systems Management I
description: Project management of agricultural systems. Emphasis placed on a team approach to problem solution. Case studies and student projects used to explore the following topics: project leadership, project organization, communication, needs assessment, feasibility studies, cost analysis, decision making, solution implementation, and evaluation. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: BRAE 203, AGB 301, AGB 310 and GE A3
